verses.roman:
saśarīre tāla gela śrī-vaikuṇṭha-dhāma
aiche śakti kāra haya, vinā eka rāma

synonyms: sa-śarīre—with the material body; tāla—the palm trees; gela—went; śrī-vaikuṇṭha-dhāma—to the spiritual kingdom, known as Vaikuṇṭha; aiche—such; śakti—power; kāra—whose; haya—is; vinā—without; eka—one; rāma—Lord Rāmacandra.
translation: "Only Lord Rāmacandra has the power to send seven palm trees to the spiritual Vaikuṇṭha planets."
